tooltip.radialLoad: Load in the radial direction (to be specified as an absolute value)
tooltip.axialLoad: Load in axial direction (to be specified as an absolute value)
tooltip.rotationSpeed: Relative rotational speed between the inner and the outer ring (to be specified as an absolute value)

errors.lowerThanEnvironmentTemperature: Cannot be less than ambient temperature
errors.innerOuterInconsistent: The bore diameter must be smaller than the outer diameter
errors.minMaxInconsistent: The minimum value must be smaller than than the maximum value
